item.title: Product Video Background Removal - Upwork
item.description:
I have 9 product video captures (ProRes 6k) on a turnstyle completing 360 degree rotations. Simple. I need the background masked or keyed out so the only thing visible is the product rotating.
The footage is not green screened and thus cannot be chroma keyed. This will probably have to be done manually (unless you know a trick or two that would expedite and simplify the process). I've already done one clip in AfterEffects myself, but don't have time to do the others.
The footage is actually quite clean and the products are pretty-well centered on the turnstyle, so keying isn't difficult.
The result should be 6k renders at with either transparency or against pure black so I can remove the background when compositing on top of other footage.

Hourly Range: $45.00-$75.00
Posted On: June 26, 2024 23:10 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Adobe After Effects, Avid Media Composer, Maxon Cinema 4D, Rotoscoping, Video Production, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Adobe After Effects, Avid Media Composer, Maxon Cinema 4D, Rotoscoping, Video Production, Video Post-Editing
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: **NEEDED** EXPERT TEAM of Video Editors BODYCAM NICHE YOUTUBE CHANNEL**** - Upwork
item.description:
**NEEDED** EXPERT TEAM of Video Editors BODYCAM NICHE YOUTUBE CHANNEL****
SEEKING: Highly motivated and talented TEAM of editors with great integrity and excellent attention to detail and able to meet deadlines REGULARLY!  We are looking for a team of top of the line EXPERTS AND EXPERIENCED professionals to join our team!
Our ideal team is experienced, communicates clearly in English, able to source extra footage to make our video edits of the HIGHEST and very BEST quality and engagement to meet the needs of our subscribers! Understands what holds retention and gains subscribers IN THIS NICHE! We WILL NOT hire anyone without proven experience on YouTube in the niche of BODYCAM, INTERROGATION.

Inquire about pricing per video edit, and possible bonus opportunities for the right candidates! And, we have plenty of regular work to keep you busy as long as our quality is the highest every time!

MAKE SURE you send examples of what you have edited in this niche or we will not respond!

YOU MUST have video samples from your most successful projects in OUR NICHE, we would like to see them!
This is an excellent opportunity for the right team!!

item.title: Creative Video Designer for videos built with remotion - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a creative video designer to join our team. As a video designer, you will be responsible for coming up with ideas for remotion video templates and creating designs that the developers can use as a reference.

The ideal candidate should have a strong understanding of video design principles and be able to produce designs / mockups / whatever suitable solution you want that will be used to make a developer understand the flow of a video and shows the components that will be used for the video template.

  Responsibilities:
  - Develop video template ideas. Sometimes with some custom based styling sometimes whatever else
  - Design motion graphics and visual elements for those video template ideas
  - Create designs that can be easily implemented by developers
  - Ensure all designs align with the guidelines

  Requirements:
  - Proven experience hopefully
  - Strong understanding of motion graphics and visual effects
  - Strong communication and collaboration skills
- notion app - setting up templates and managing a notion space

  If you are passionate about creating video designs we would love to hear from you. Please submit your portfolio showcasing your video design work.

Hourly Range: $10.00-$25.00
Posted On: June 26, 2024 23:00 UTC
Category: Graphic Design
Skills:Graphic Design, Motion Graphics, Animation, Videography
Skills: Graphic Design, Motion Graphics, Animation, Videography
Country: Switzerland
click to apply

item.description:

How comfortable are you with creating engaging Instagram Reels?

Fred

item.title: Videographer for Video Course in Los Angeles - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled videographer to help us in recording a video course consisting of eight video lessons in Los Angeles. The ideal candidate should have experience in shooting instructional videos and be familiar with the equipment and techniques required to capture high-quality footage. The videographer will be responsible for setting up and operating the camera, ensuring proper lighting and sound, and capturing different angles and shots to enhance the learning experience. Attention to detail and the ability to work independently are essential. This is an exciting opportunity to contribute to an educational project and showcase your expertise in videography.

Skills required:
- Videography
- Camera operation
- Lighting setup
- Sound recording
- Attention to detail

Budget: $1,000
Posted On: June 26, 2024 22:41 UTC
Category: Videography
Skills:Videography, Video Editing, Video Production, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Videography, Video Editing, Video Production, Video Post-Editing
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: (Your Dream Job ) Learn While Earning, Video Idea Finders Needed - Upwork
item.description:
We need someone who can find popular videos in our niche, videos teaching our audience how to do something valuable
If you want to get paid $30 for 30 copied videos

A regular video idea is $1 a script is worth $3

Here is an example of the type of videos we want you to get Ideas from


https://www.instagram.com/reel/C4Ye25qPbCp/?igsh=MWJkZjVjdnNieTBxNA==
https://www.instagram.com/reel/C4XUQYxoVFt/?igsh=MWZhanQ4dWt5OXF3YQ==



Moral Standards:

https://docs.google.com/document/d/1oRNYkZAmuVYzMAWyA_e_fTRjcUJsEpaFvzg_rV6zDL8/edit?usp=sharing



Professional standards:

https://docs.google.com/document/d/16-h7EuZb7OJF1mW39efyDu2iMqv6fWd_47F2SNQYOCY/edit?usp=sharing


Speed- We need you to be able to crank out 5 video Ideas a day

Quality- We need you to find quality video ideas from videos that are performing well and also make unique video ideas for clients who request them. (Important)This also means that the information that you turn into video ideas needs to be accurate meaning you need to fact-check information before submitting it because if the information is inaccurate and you mess up a client's reputation you will likely be fired

Communication- if you don’t understand things or need help, reaching out is important to avoid critical mistakes you need to be good enough not to have many problems but also humble enough to get help when you do have a problem so that you do not mess up any content that gets put out
All of these values must be held up the whole time you work for and with us to keep your job, we also want you as a part of communication to tell us beforehand when you will be available and let us know ahead of time if you will be too busy to work

If this job interests you send a proposal and if we like it we will allow you to find 1 of each style video idea and one unique one and if they are good you will get the job”


Budget: $500
Posted On: June 26, 2024 22:33 UTC
Category: Creative Writing
Skills:Business Writing, English, Creative Writing, Content Writing
Skills: Business Writing, English, Creative Writing, Content Writing
Country: United States
click to apply
